Crawly

Extract meaningful data from any website in real-time

Reserve your invitation now ! Get More Information

Scrap Anything

Crawly can explore any website on the web and extract all the information contained in it. Just tell it what to extract with our interface and it will do the work.

In Real Time

Crawly constantly explores your selection of websites and updates its database as soon as a change is detected. All the previous data are kept and available.

But Not Just Data !

Crawly get you all the data you need, and it can be huge. Our statistics tools helps you get the meaning behind the data and its evolution in time.
